article_title: Mom gives birth at home in winter storm after 2 hospitals sent her home
article_text:
On Thursday, Amanda Anderson was twice told she wasn’t ready yet for birth

Early Friday, baby was born on a couch with help of family and emergency crew

Mom and baby girl are doing well

article_metadata.news-keywords: childbirth, labor, delivery, emergency, cornelius, birth, hospital, baby, home, couch
article_metadata.description: Nine months pregnant, Amanda Anderson began having contractions about two minutes apart Thursday, and she assumed her third child would arrive soon, in advance of the predicted snow and ice storm.
article_metadata.title: Mom gives birth at home in winter storm after 2 hospitals sent her home | The Charlotte Observer
